task.title: Add Corresponding Fields with the Expression Evaluator
task.shortdesc: Use an Expression Editor to add fields to the non-credit card data flow so all records have the same format.

context.p: To do this, let's use data preview to verify the structure of records in the credit card branch.

step.cmd: In the pipeline, click the Jython Evaluator to view the output of that processor.
Expand the first output record, scroll down, and expand index 21. Note the header and value information, and then click Close Preview.

In the stage library, select the Expression Evaluator processor and connect it to default output of the Stream Selector. Or from the Pipeline Creation Help Bar, click Select Processor to Connect Expression Evaluator .
Click the Add icon twice and configure the properties as follows:
To write the data from this branch to the destination and merge the non-credit card data with the credit card data, link the Expression Evaluator to the Hadoop FS destination.
